message.content:
cs.CV, cs.HC, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.LG 

This paper discusses the creation of a video database for human computer interaction applications, specifically for face detection, face pose estimation, face tracking, and eye gaze estimation. These applications are commonly studied in the computer vision (cs.CV) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC) sub-categories. The paper also mentions the use of algorithms for these applications, which falls under the multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category. Additionally, the paper focuses on the use of Near Infra-Red (NIR) illumination, which is a topic of interest in the information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category. Lastly, the paper discusses the creation of a valuable resource for development and evaluation of algorithms, which falls under the machine learning (cs.LG) sub-category.
